discussion.author: nilshg
discussion.text:
TSC is really not a great name - google says it means typescript compiler or tuberculosis sclerosis complex.

Short acronyms aren't always disallowed but there must be very good reasons to get them into General (say the name of a file format like CSV, json, or some published method that is unambiguously identified by an acronym).

That said this looks like a cool package and we're desperately short on cool time series packages, so consider renaming - why not just `TimeSeriesClassification`?

discussion.author: antoninkriz
discussion.text: I've talked about this with people on the Julia Slack and we came to the same conclusion. I renamed it to `TimeSeriesClassification.jl`. Thanks!

discussion.author: antoninkriz
discussion.text: This PR can be closed thanks to https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/90018
